name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing high-performance applications, possessing advanced proficiency in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and solid understanding of software development practices, including Software Behavior Verification. I have a proven ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts and document software processes, ensuring clear collaboration with cross-functional teams.

Specializing in full-stack development, I leverage my expertise in frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, while also maintaining a strong focus on best practices in **AI** implementation. My technical background is complemented by my hands-on experience with cloud platforms including **Azure** and **AWS**, allowing me to deliver scalable solutions that meet industry standards. I am adept at leading projects that incorporate innovative technologies and methodologies, all while maintaining strict adherence to documentation and communication protocols.

Created and maintained comprehensive documentation for software behavior verification, ensuring enhanced collaboration across teams and greater adherence to project guidelines.
